# Copilot Instructions for buckarooney

## Project Overview
buckarooney is a GitHub repository project currently in its initial stages.

## Guidelines

### General Principles
- Keep code simple and maintainable
- Write clear and concise commit messages
- Follow industry best practices for the technology stack being used

### Code Quality
- Ensure code is well-documented when appropriate
- Write readable and self-explanatory code
- Consider edge cases and error handling

### Testing
- Include tests for new features when test infrastructure exists
- Ensure changes don't break existing functionality

### Documentation
- Update README.md when adding new features or changing functionality
- Keep documentation in sync with code changes
